channel.title: Project on ACA
channel.description: Recent content in Project on ACA

item.title: Sample Project
item.description: This is a single player air-fight based game built on Unity3D platform. The scripts were written in C# language using Microsoft Visual Studio This game comprises of two modes- Arcade Mode: The war is fought on three battle ground. One has to lead his forces through all these battlegrounds to lead his forces to victory. Desert Hills Icy Mountains Survival Mode: In this one has to survive in the battlefield as long as he can.
